name: Pula Piolho
description:
Description

You are a louse with a dream: to find the perfect head of hair in a crowded party.
But you have to jump from one guest to another, avoiding the pitfalls of dancing and moving people. Can you make it to the guy with the incredible hair?
Pula Piolho is a platformer game that will make you itch for more.

Controls

Use your mouse to grab onto people's heads by pressing it.
Release at the right time for jumping.
